casebody.data:
STATE
v.
James MEYNARDIE. No. 446PA05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 20, 2007. Robert C. Montgomery, Assistant Attorney General, Seth Edwards, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of February 2007 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (James Meynardie) shall have up to and including the 23rd day of February 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 20th day of February 2007."
